Class GameDecorator

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.triton.launcher.utils.obs.Observable<InfoMessage>
it.polimi.ingsw.triton.launcher.server.model.game.GameMode
it.polimi.ingsw.triton.launcher.server.model.game.GameDecorator
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExpertGame
public class GameDecorator extends GameMode
This decorator provides additional methods that can be called in expertGame.
